entry.title: $2550 // $2550 / 1br - One Room for rent in 2 bedroom in Brooklyn Heights (180
entry.content:
Hi, I'm looking to sublet my room starting in February. The lease goes until July 2019 with an option to renew.

Building:
The building has coin-operated laundry, a small gym, a small BBQ deck and a front desk attendant.

Apartment:
The apartment has two bedrooms and two bathrooms, a kitchen with a bar that looks into the living area. There are two closets in the common area. The living area has a TV and couch and the kitchen has cooking utensils, plates, glasses and mugs.

Room:
Your bedroom (the one with the alcove in the floor plan) would easily fit a queen bed with lots of room to spare. I may be willing to leave the bed/mattress and a dresser if that helps your decision. The bed is a queen. The room also has a wide closet.

Roommate:
Your roommate is a whimsical and thoughtful 28 year old guy who works at a Fin Tech company in FiDi. He tends to be pretty clean and quiet, but is always down to watch a movie or chat. He has been a pleasure to live with!

I am willing to negotiate both move-in date and rent! Let me know if you have any questions.
